sql-case.value: SELECT user_id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER w AS 'row_number', RANK() OVER w AS 'rank', DENSE_RANK() OVER w AS 'dense_rank' FROM t_order WHERE order_id = ? WINDOW w AS (ORDER BY user_id)
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY k ORDER BY v) FROM t_order
SELECT LEAD(v) OVER (PARTITION BY k ORDER BY v) FROM t_order
SELECT FIRST_VALUE(v) OVER (PARTITION BY k ORDER BY v) FROM t_order
SELECT LAST_VALUE(v) OVER (PARTITION BY k ORDER BY v ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) FROM t_order
SELECT SUM(v) OVER (PARTITION BY k ORDER BY v ROWS BETWEEN 1 PRECEDING AND 1 FOLLOWING) FROM t_order
